definition: classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)

sentences.english: Be sure to use industry-specific and job-specific terminology that will be known the world over.
sentences.chinese: 確保使用符合特殊行業和特殊職業的全球通用術語。

sentences.english: The language of England girdles the globe.
Finally, there is no global prescription for change.
sentences.chinese: 最後，改革沒有全球通用的妙方。

sentences.english: The sentence "English is the global language."
sentences.chinese: 近年來，“英語是全球通用語。”

definition: to make a long distance call
